item.title: jLoan Calculation
item.description: Loan Calculation Example Loan Rule Defintion Installment Calculation Overdue Calculation IRR Calculation Loan Rule Definition Installments Calculation repayment-Principal: ROUND(10000/3,2) repayment-interest: ROUND(10000*2%,2) Advanced Repayment calculation Overall Payment = Current Term Repayment + Remain Principal+ default penalty(10000*1%)
